definition: Huainan prefecture-level city in Anhui
name of a river

surname Nan
Huainan prefecture-level city in Anhui
miscellany of writing from the Western Han (aka Former Han)

sentences.english: Office in Huainan City, Chaoyang Road, Ruijin Building, 23rd Floor.
sentences.chinese: 辦公於淮南市朝陽路瑞金大廈23樓。

sentences.english: According to legend, during the Han Dynasty, the King of Huainan, Liu An, is especially keen on books about immortals and ghosts.
sentences.chinese: 相傳漢朝的淮南王劉安特別喜愛看描寫神仙鬼怪的書。

sentences.english: Hope our friends invest in Huainan and make a killing in Anguang.
sentences.chinese: 希望我們的朋友投資在淮南，賺錢在安廣。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the distribution of mites in edible Fungi in Huainan City.
sentences.chinese: 目的調查淮南市食用菌蟎類的孳生情況。

sentences.english: I come from Huainan City, Anhui Province.
Song dynasty literary giant who exclaimed, "Huainan Xinyang tea first."
sentences.chinese: 宋朝大文豪蘇東坡曾經齰舌“淮南茶信陽第一”。

sentences.english: Huainan partridge duck is excellently autochthonous breed in Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 淮南麻鴨是河南省優良地方家禽品種。

sentences.english: Support of soft rock was a difficult problem in support of sinking and driving in Huainan mining area.
sentences.chinese: 軟巖支護一直是困擾淮南礦區巷道支護的一大難題。

sentences.english: Excavate coal subsided water area is the special component of the surface water in Huainan.
sentences.chinese: 採煤塌陷水域已成爲淮南市礦區一種特殊的地表水體。

sentences.english: Natural nidus of Trichobilharzia exists in Huainan area.
sentences.chinese: 淮南地區存在毛畢屬吸蟲自然疫源地。

sentences.english: Huainan coalfield is rich in coalbed methane resources and has large - scale coalmine methane drainage.
sentences.chinese: 淮南煤田煤層氣資源豐富，煤層氣抽採具備較大規模。

sentences.english: We will study and research, to promote good experience and practices of Huainan Mining.
sentences.chinese: 我們將通過學習調研，推廣淮南礦業好的經驗和做法。

sentences.english: Huainan Liu Jie decided to join several other major 'rebellion.
sentences.chinese: 淮南劉傑決定聯合其他幾家大的藩王起兵造反。

sentences.english: Objective To know the infected situation of cercarial dermatitis along the banks of Huaihe river.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解淮河水系淮南地區尾蚴性皮炎感染狀況。

sentences.english: it is hard for big countries to empathise with how small countries feel about this issue,” Mr Perng said on Thursday after a central bank meeting.
sentences.chinese: 彭淮南在上週四央行會議後表示。

sentences.english: Wang Huonan was a rich man in Huainan.
sentences.chinese: 王獲楠是淮南的一個財主。
